A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible addition to the Star Wars lore. Everything about this movie was poorly written and directed. Too many unnecessary sub-plots\, and characters that shouldn't have been in the movie. So many points in the film did not make sense. Disney\, you have ruined Star Wars.  Your sequel trilogy is turning out to be complete garbage. Do yourself a favor and give back Star Wars back to its' creator\, Lucas.
